Token.Abstract: This class handles HTTP networking with the Bridge REST API.
If you want to use SBBNetworkManager's features to access a different REST API, you can create an instance using this initializer, with the scheme and host part of that API's URL as the baseURL.

Parameter.Name: baseURL
Parameter.Abstract: The scheme and host part of a third-party REST API, e.g. https://webapi.somecompany.com . The urlString parameter of the put, get, etc. methods could then either be the fully-qualified URL of the endpoint you are accessing, or just the path part.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An initialized SBBNetworkManager instance with the given baseURL.

Token.Abstract: This is a convenience method that assumes a default value of NO for background.
Perform an HTTP GET with the specified URL, HTTP headers, parameters, and completion handler.

Parameter.Name: URLString
Parameter.Abstract: The URL to which you are making this HTTP request.

Parameter.Name: headers
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP headers for this request.

Parameter.Name: parameters
Parameter.Abstract: The parameters for this request, to be passed in the query portion of the request.

Parameter.Name: background
Parameter.Abstract: A BOOL flag indicating whether the request should be performed as a background download.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed on completion of the request (successful or otherwise), of type SBBNetworkManagerCompletionBlock.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The NSURLSessionTask used to make the request, so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: This is a convenience method that assumes a default value of NO for background.
Perform an HTTP PUT with the specified URL, HTTP headers, parameters, and completion handler.

Parameter.Name: URLString
Parameter.Abstract: The URL to which you are making this HTTP request.

Parameter.Name: headers
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP headers for this request.

Parameter.Name: parameters
Parameter.Abstract: The parameters for this request, to be passed in the request body as JSON. May be nil.

Parameter.Name: background
Parameter.Abstract: A BOOL flag indicating whether the request should be performed as a background download.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed on completion of the request (successful or otherwise), of type SBBNetworkManagerCompletionBlock.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The NSURLSessionTask used to make the request, so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: This is a convenience method that assumes a default value of NO for background.
Perform an HTTP POST with the specified URL, HTTP headers, parameters, and completion handler.

Parameter.Name: URLString
Parameter.Abstract: The URL to which you are making this HTTP request.

Parameter.Name: headers
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP headers for this request.

Parameter.Name: parameters
Parameter.Abstract: The parameters for this request, to be passed in the request body as JSON. May be nil.

Parameter.Name: background
Parameter.Abstract: A BOOL flag indicating whether the request should be performed as a background download.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed on completion of the request (successful or otherwise), of type SBBNetworkManagerCompletionBlock.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The NSURLSessionTask used to make the request, so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: This is a convenience method that assumes a default value of NO for background.
Perform an HTTP DELETE with the specified URL, HTTP headers, parameters, and completion handler.

Parameter.Name: URLString
Parameter.Abstract: The URL to which you are making this HTTP request.

Parameter.Name: headers
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP headers for this request.

Parameter.Name: parameters
Parameter.Abstract: The parameters for this request, to be passed in the request body as JSON. Usually for a DELETE this will be nil.

Parameter.Name: background
Parameter.Abstract: A BOOL flag indicating whether the request should be performed as a background download.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed on completion of the request (successful or otherwise), of type SBBNetworkManagerCompletionBlock.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The NSURLSessionTask used to make the request, so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: Perform a background upload of a file to a given URL with provided HTTP headers.

Parameter.Name: fileUrl
Parameter.Abstract: The URL of the file to be uploaded.

Parameter.Name: headers
Parameter.Abstract: An NSDictionary containing the HTTP headers as key-value pairs.

Parameter.Name: urlString
Parameter.Abstract: The URL (as a string) to which to upload the file.

Parameter.Name: description
Parameter.Abstract: A string to associate with this task.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: SBBNetworkManagerTaskCompletionBlock to be called upon completion of the upload.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The NSURLSessionUploadTask used to make the request, so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: Perform a background download of a file from a given URL with provided method, headers, and parameters.

Parameter.Name: urlString
Parameter.Abstract: The URL from which to download the file. If relative, the base URL will be prepended.

Parameter.Name: httpMethod
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP method to use for the request (e.g., GET, POST).

Parameter.Name: headers
Parameter.Abstract: HTTP headers for the request. To these will be added User-Agent, Accept-Language, and (if not specified) Content-Type will be set to application/json.

Parameter.Name: parameters
Parameter.Abstract: Query parameters for a GET, or body parameters for a POST.

Parameter.Name: description
Parameter.Abstract: A string to associate with this task.

Parameter.Name: downloadCompletion
Parameter.Abstract: SBBNetworkManagerDownloadCompletionBlock to be called upon successful download, with the URL of the file to which the downloaded data was saved.

Parameter.Name: taskCompletion
Parameter.Abstract: SBBNetworkManagerTaskCompletionBlock to be called upon unsuccessful completion.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The NSURLSessionDownloadTask used to make the request, so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: This method should be called from your app delegate's application:handleEventsForBackgroundURLSession:completionHandler: method when the identifier passed in there matches kBackgroundSessionIdentifier.

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: The session identifier, as passed in to your app delegate's application:handleEventsForBackgroundURLSession:completionHandler: method.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: The completion handler, as passed in to your app delegate's application:handleEventsForBackgroundURLSession:completionHandler: method.
